title: Assign Tasks Based on Operator Skill
description: A task to operate a specialized piece of equipment (e.g., a turret truck) is created. The WMS must assign it only to operators certified to use that equipment.

tasks.description: A move task is generated that requires a turret truck.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies the equipment requirement for the task.

tasks.description: The WMS checks the profiles of all available operators to see who has the 'Turret Truck' certification.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies three certified operators who are currently active.

tasks.description: The system assigns the task to the closest available, certified operator.
tasks.expected_outcome: The task is assigned to the most logical operator based on skill and location.
